name: Drones, The Human Condition
description: Your Task is Simple, Kill Drones, Free Humans, Don't Die! Drones, The Human Condition is a fast paced twin stick, top down arena shoot 'em up, set in a futuristic Orwellian dystopia. Bring on the destruction!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2.2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
